60f6bd7e-b8a3-4d2e-9588-fe69c7ea7c8e.description: Earners of the CBT Skills micro credential will gain skills in short-course cognitive-behavioral therapy. Earners will successfully perform the following skills including: 1) identify client resources, barriers and goals; 2) Symptom containment and progressive relaxation; 3) Risk assessment and safety behaviors; and 5) Restructuring core beliefs. Earners' skills will benefit State-licensed counselors (LCSW, LMHC, LMFT) and Non-licensed Masters-level counselors or students.
60f6bd7e-b8a3-4d2e-9588-fe69c7ea7c8e.name: CBT Skills

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of all six modules.
Successful completion of all six modules and all  skill-based assignments including 1) quizzes 2) progress notes and treatment plans; and 3)  skill-based roll plays.

1)Earn a 80% or higher  on the multiple-choice quizzes in each module; 2) Earn a score of at least three out of four on the progress notes and the treatment plans; and 3) Earn a score of at least three out of four in the skill-based role plays.

0bb62cb8-d8a3-4e26-9bd5-3c22ee145942.description: Earners of the Grantsmanship micro credential can successfully: 1) create a logic model; 2) create a problem statement; 3) write a grant narrative; 4) develop a budget; and 5) develop an implementation and sustainability plan. Earners' skills will benefit both non-profit organizations and companies where their employees need to quickly upskill in grantsmanship to meet the organization's funding needs.
0bb62cb8-d8a3-4e26-9bd5-3c22ee145942.name: Grantsmanship 1

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of all five modules.

Successful completion of all skill-based assignments including 1) Create a Logic Model;  2) Write a Problem Statement; 3) Write a grant narrative; 4) Develop a budget; and 5) Explain implementation and sustainability plan of a grant.
A score of 3 or better must be earned for each skill being assessed.

ccbfb8ef-dce1-4d34-bbcd-64868d674bed.name: Command Officer Management Executive Leadership Institute Class XXIV

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of the Command Officer Management Executive Institute Badge can successfully perform the requisite skills in the following areas of law enforcement: 1. Leadership, 2. Human Resource Management; 3. Legal and Ethical Responsibilities; 4. Critical Incident Management, Preparation, and Deployment; and 5. Strategic Management Operations for the Criminal Justice Administrators.

38ea68c7-894d-478c-a665-d84e3961afa0.description: This micro-credential badge provides the academic eligibility you need for QMHP-A credentialing. Students will be responsible for meeting State and regulatory body criteria, as well as all supervisor hours. Earners of the QMHP-A micro credential can successfully demonstrate the following skills: 1) Client Engagement, Assessments and Communication; 2) Case Management ; 3) Stress Based Interventions ; 4)Service Planning; 5) Documentation; 6) Group Facilitation; and 7) Professional Helper.
38ea68c7-894d-478c-a665-d84e3961afa0.name: Qualified Mental Health Professional-Adult (QMHP-A) Academic Tracking

badge_template_activities.title: This badge is for those who have a human services or related degree. Adding this micro-credential badge to your degree provides the academic eligibility you need for QMHP-A credentialing. Earners must successfully complete of all five courses with a proficiency rating of 80% on all skill-based assignments.

Successful completion of all skill-based assignments including 1) Client Engagement and Communication; 2) Case Management ; 3) Problem Solving ; 4)Service Planning; 5) Documentation; 6) Group Facilitation; and 7) Professional Helper.
A score of 80% or better must be earned for each skill being assessed.
